text:
Ahmad Bardolia
Project Lead for Infosys OpenStack

- Email me on Indeed: indeed.com/r/Ahmad-Bardolia/8e2c49ea8e7dcd27

• OpenStack Cloud implementation as a Project Lead for Infosys OpenStack triplO (Redhat
Director) Private cloud with OpenShift in India
• OpenStack Cloud implementation as a Project Lead for Makemytrip OpenStack Private cloud
in India
• OpenStack Cloud implementation as a Project Lead for Solartis (Chennai, Madurai) OpenStack
Private cloud in India
• Team member of OpenStack Private cloud deployment of Cisco USA
• Deployed Private cloud using OpenStack for Government (Bangalore Police) cloud data center
• 6 POC on OpenStack private cloud
• 3 production cloud deployments using OpenStack and kvm
• Virtualization: Hyper-V, Esxi, KVM, Citrix Xen Server
• Cloud: AWS, Azure, Google Cloud Platform (GCP), OpenStack, Red hat Cloud Director
• AWS Cloud skills: EC2, EBS, Autoscaling, S3, cloud formation, RDS, DynamoDB, Route 53, AWS
API, AWS python SDK, SNS, SQS, SWF, workspaces, Beanstalk, AWS redshift, AWS Elastic Map
reduce
• Cloud foundry: Developer and Deploying Pivotal cloud foundry on AWS, Google
• OpenShift Enterprise: Implementing Redhat OpenShift Enterprise on Premise or on OpenStack
or on AWS, Azure, OR on OpenStack
• Azure Cloud Skills: Virtual machines, Azure Active Directory, Traffic Manager, Azure Storage,
Azure storage, Azure networking, Implementing Azure solutions

• Google Cloud Skills: hands on knowledge on Google compute engine, Migration to Google cloud,
GCP - Container Engine-An Overview, GCP - Container Registry, GCP - Cloud Storage, GCP - Cloud
Datastore, GCP - Cloud SQL, GCP - Networking, Load Balancing, GCP - Cloud DNS, GCP - Cloud
Dataproc ( Big Data service), GCP - Cloud IAM

• Automation: Chef, Puppet and ansible essential

• PaaS skills: Pivotal cloud foundry, Redhat OpenShift

• Docker Skills: Docker essentials and Docker swarm advanced, Docker cloud, Docker cloud data
center, GitHub integration for Docker, Kubernetes.

• Version control: GitHub, Bit Bucket

• DevOps Skill: Jenkins, Maven, SonarQube, Teamcity, Octopus, JFrog, Nexus

Willing to relocate: Anywhere

WORK EXPERIENCE

Project Lead for Infosys OpenStack

OpenStack Cloud -  Chennai, Tamil Nadu
